headline: E-Cigarette and Vape Market Competitive Landscape Report 2025, with Profiles of Leading Players and Innovative Companies
summary: The e-cigarette and vape market is projected to surge from $27.75 billion in 2024 to $67.11 billion in 2029, driven by urbanization, enhanced devices, and increased health awareness. Key players like Altria Group and Lost Mary are expanding offerings to meet rising demand for safer smoking alternatives.
